sections.heading: Number of new trials in jury cases
sections.text:
Not more than two (2) new trials shall be granted to the same party in an action at law, or upon the trial by jury of an issue of fact in equity.Code 1858, § 3122 (deriv. Acts 1801, ch. 6, § 59); Shan., § 4850; Code 1932, § 8984; T.C.A. (orig. ed.), § 27-202.
